Title: Investigating the relation between lexical smells and change-and fault-proneness: an empirical study
Elements_risk_assessment: BIC could be not the BIC
UseOF-SZZ: To detect bug-inducing changes that were then linked to the code review information extracted from the issue tracking system
Summary:
To explore the relationship between reviewers’ code inspections
    and personal, temporal and participation factors that might affect the quality of such inspections.
Outcome: The reasons why reviewers miss bugs are related to both their personal characteristics, as well as the technical properties of the patches under review
